title: Minecraft Fun Commands Plugin
shortDescription: A fun commands plugin with fun commands such as /cage <player>, /launch <player>...
description: A Java-based Minecraft plugin implementing a complete fun commands plugin. Such as /cage <player> for a specific duration with a title shown to players, some other troll commands, all can be used by admins to have some fun :)
reason: I needed to have some fun in my server. And what's more fun than trolling players as owner?
